data.actual_result: Message does not allow editing without shortening to below 2000 characters. Example, 2000 ☕ sent will render as almost 16,000 characters if you try to edit the message it will not allow it until shortened
data.expected_result: either the ability to edit a previously submitted message without having to shorten it or be unable to submit a message over 2000 characters, which is diffcult if you use unicode characters rather than discord format. Or do not count :characters: in message counts.
data.short_description: emoji counts will override 2000 character limit making messages non-editable
data.steps_to_repro: - Create message (for example, rules) containing 2000 characters in a text editor entering unicode characters for emoji - Step 2 - attempt to edit the message after pasting into discord, the emojis will have been converted from their unicode character to the discord format, using more characters
